summary: Fulvio, a manager who recently got fired and into some legal trouble, is to be supervised by his brother, a parish priest in the Italian province. To help this community in financial crisis... See full summary Â»
cast: Alessandro Siani|Fabio De Luigi|Ana Caterina Morariu|Serena Autieri|Giovanni Esposito|Giacomo Rizzo|Maria Del Monte|Paolo Triestino|Benedetto Casillo|Massimiliano Gallo|Mimmo Manfredi|Francesco Procopio|Francesco Bocchetti|Andrea Canfora|Gennaro Guazzo|Laura Iannone|Angelo Minichino|Michael Uwaifo Olabiyi|Antonio Sepe|Miloud Mourad Benamara|Camillo Milli|Raffaele Musella|Pasquale Palma|Tommaso Bianco|Enzo Casertano|Stefano Fregni|Erand Hoxha|Gigi Savoia
title: Si accettano miracoli
